articles.title: Q&A - What is A Course in Miracles?
articles.body_html:
What is A Course in Miracles?

A Course in Miracles is a self-study spiritual teaching and program with the aim of bringing the learner to Self-realization as eternal spirit – the goal of all spiritual paths. This teaching is a proven direct method of restoring personal communication with the One Source of all that ever is, was, and will be. It provides a theoretical framework as well as a 365-day mind training program to guide learners in attaining this goal.

It is the work of Jesus Christ through scribe Helen Shucman and editor Bill Thetford. It was popularized by the teaching of Kenneth Wapnick. Read more of its history at https://wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Course_in_Miracles.

It is composed of three parts: A Text, a Workbook, and a Teacher’s Manual.

  • The Text: Foundational theory and framework of ideology
  • The Workbook: A 365-day program in mind training that guides students through the steps of Self-realization.
  • The Manual for Teachers: a collection of questions and answers regarding the practical day-to-day living of the teaching within A Course in Miracles as well as spiritual concerns not covered in the Text.

The Course itself says it is only one of many spiritual paths that lead to God or Self-realization. In modern times, it is the most easily accessible and straightforward approach at what is undoubtedly the highest goal attainable by humanity – personal salvation and salvation of the world.

Attain your Higher Self from the comfort of your own seat. No dogma. No rituals. No sin. No punishment. Simply a teaching of the infinite and eternal nature of Love.

This is a course in miracles. It is a required course. Only the time you take it is voluntary. Free will does not mean that you can establish the curriculum. It means only that you may elect what you want to take at a given time.

The course does not aim at teaching the meaning of love, for that is beyondwhat can be taught. It does aim, however, at removing the blocks to the awarenessof love’s presence, which is your natural inheritance. The opposite of love is fear, but what is all-encompassing can have no opposite.

This course can therefore be summed up very simply in this way:

Nothing real can be threatened.

Nothing unreal exists.

Herein lies the peace of God.

A Course in Miracles, Introduction

articles.title: abcim the Blog Post
articles.body_html:
The alex brady Course in Miracles (abcim) is a set of steps for guaranteed spiritual enlightenment/awakening/realization.

The primary process is for you to a) see the humanity's world for what it is, b) read and cross-reference different spiritual paths to learn the dimension of self where to expect growth, and c) study A Course in Miracles, a complete breakdown of the egoic and spiritual thought processes, complete with guided practice in applying spiritual thought processes.

Steps for Spiritual Realization:

  1. Join the Club

    Your inner guidance system should be telling you to join. If you join, you're starting off right. It's at reddit.com/r/iamalexbrady

  2. Cultural Unlearning

    Comparative looks at what we are told and a set of complete opposite truths.

    Consume two revelatory or "counter culture" art pieces. Here is a list of my personal favorite selections. There is a universe of other options. Be able to answer the question:

    Name one concept the society that you live in in which the values that are espoused do not match behavior. Where the story that is told does not match the facts.

    The point not to convince you of other viewpoints. The point is but to present these perspectives as alternative to preconceived truths. Useful for concept debate practice and inner guidance checking. Come discuss on r/iamalexbrady.

    When presented with fact that did not match previous views, you are encouraged to consider that neither are true, and to sit with yourself and internal guidance to determine the best truth for the matter.

  3. Spiritual Learning

    Find the mento-/spirtual flavors you like

    There are spiritual teachings you will vibe with more than others. Collect the ones you like.

    Start meditating, guided and self-guided.

  4. A Course in Miracles

    Suggested order. Can be done simultaneously.

    Start the Text. Finish it, too.

    As soon as you've experienced a miracle by your own definition, begin the workbook and practice it as written.

    You're going to want to wait until you've experienced a miracle. Going through the workbook with high motivation is ideal. Feel free to start sooner.

    Read the Manual when you remember it exists.


    a.b special opinion: If you're not going through the workbook as written, you are fucking up. If the task for the day is "1 minute per hour every hour say six words" and you miss the goal most hours, you are not going to realize the benefits of mind training because you are not training your mind. Do the workbook right.

  5. Continuing Unlearning

    The moment you considered any part of alexbrady, you began to come unloosed from the world. About halfway through the workbook, you should have began to see the world in a new light, an understanding that there is more to the world than space and time.

    Next is a gradual process of unlearning. You should have had glimpses from the workbook practice that your mental desires are the sole determiner of your world. The unlearning process, guided by your own internal guidance system, will take you from glimpses to vision.

    Over time you begin to understand how "All things are lessons God would have me learn." You will become a happy learner of these joyful lessons rather than maintain pretenses of egoic upsets.

    Congratulations. 🥳 You're enlightened.

  6. Christ Guidance

    You will welcome Christ guidance into your life. You've already always been doing it. You will simply realize how this is the case, welcome it, and get good at it.

    Congratulations. 🥳 You're awakened.

  7. Realize you are Christ.

    Congratulations. 🥳 You're realized.

FAQs

Do I have to join the club?

No. In fact, if you don't want to, please do not.

Do I have to read A Course in Miracles?

This whole list can be abridged to

  1. Study A Course in Miracles

Yes, read ACIM. If you have a different book you like, use that one. I personally cannot guarantee another.

Is the workbook hard? Why do people not do it correctly?

The workbook is very simple. Part of the mind training process is to learn to train your attention. Lack of what we are training -- mental strength and attention -- is the impediment to the training.

Be patient with yourself. When you begin to experience the benefits of consistent practice, you will be motivated to engage more.

How do you know I will have a miracle?

You are doing miracles all the time, you just aren't realizing it. Read the books listed to begin opening your awareness of where and how your spiritual nature resides. Once you become aware of these and the understandings that lead to it, you will realize when a miracle occurs. That small conviction will be a good boost into the workbook.

Will I turn water into wine?

You can do whatever you want 😎

Do I have to read all of the recommended books?

No. One counter culture piece and two spiritual books are all that is considered "mandatory" reading for before A Course in Miracles. As stated before, only ACIM is truly mandatory.

How long will this take?

If you begin ACIM's workbook with strong conviction and engage fully, you will reach "enlightenment" by lesson 101.

So, the time until your first miracle + 101 days. The rest of the steps continue indefinitely.

What if that doesn't work?

It does. If it doesn't work, consider the words "engage fully". If that doesn't reveal the problem, email me.

Are there more steps?

Yes, of course.
